column5: Looking for a fishing report for Pike Lake that is near Perth Ontario off the scotch line. My dad and I are thinking of trying it but have never fished it. If anyone on here has fished it ( especially this year ) any advice on how to fish it, good place and what bait seems to work or what areas of the lake to avoid that may have hidden rocks/stumps would be greatly appreciated. May not be going for 2 weeks, will depend on work and weather.  Thanks, Eric
Ive fished it caught a few small pike and bass . Nice little lake we only fished for an hour or so before we got blown off by a thunderstorm.
